message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CY 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG) as it proposes a new learning method for contextual bandit problems. It also involves text classification and document retrieval, which are common tasks in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also mentions the use of counterfactual learning and off-policy evaluation, which are techniques commonly used in reinforcement learning (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the importance of user experience, which is relevant to the sub-category of human-computer interaction (cs.CY).
